title: 🍹Happy Hour! Increase $LONG Emission for 💣 Operation Bombshot.
body:
🍹 We propose to increase the $LONG emissions rate during the duration of Operation Bombshot. 

📈 Current emission levels are at 0.42 $LONG per block, c. 12096 $LONG per day. We propose to increase emission to 0.69 $LONG per block, c. 19872 $LONG per day. 

💣 Increased $LONG emission shall be used to reward Operation Bombshot participants. As alluded to in earlier postings, we want to phase out rewards for $BEV single-asset staking as well. The reward freed up thereby will go to Operation Bombshot pools. 

🎁 Additionally, all treasury rewards will be used to reward Operation Bombshot participants for its entire duration. 🎁

🧮 We propose to split the additional rewards among all pools according to their weight in $BEV. We will take a weight snapshot at 1 p.m. UTC on June 20th. For example, at the time of writing $BAKE represents 14.89% of $BEV. Thus, 14.89% of all additional $LONG will be emitted to users staking $BAKE. 

⏱️ If approved, increased $LONG emission rates will go live at 3 p.m. UTC on Monday, June 21st. Emission rates will be lowered to current rates upon Operation Bombshot finishing. 

🗳️ The vote will go live at 1 p.m. UTC on June 18th and last until 1 p.m. UTC, June 20th.
author: 0x33756a0A837Ec2babee7244bb6D5793FD7306818
